duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outpatient care for patients of all ages, managing their medical needs and promoting wellness.
Maintain and update comprehensive medical records for all patients under care.
Diagnose and treat common medical issues, providing primary care services to patients.
Manage a panel of patients, providing ongoing medical attention and support.
Adhere to regular clinic hours for face-to-face patient appointments, without weekend clinic hours.

education_certification.credential: Board Certification in Family Practice (PA-C or FNP) with eligibility or licensed in the state of MA.
Completion of a full educational program in the US.
